posts.post_title: FS: T206 Fire Sale Prices Are Rock Bottom
posts.post_content:

The king is in Austin !! Great area Larry !! Be in Dallas week after next, not close enough for lunch though...try to make it to Chicago !! My offer stands for a place to crash !!
